jobs.title: Growth Marketing Intern at Fintech startup
jobs.description:
Lumio technologies 

Location of work: London

Duration: 4 months (with a view to a permanent position) 

Lumio is the Skyscanner for personal finance. We connect people to products. Combining personalised financial guidance with intuitive education, to empower millennials to make smarter financial decisions.

Key Responsibilities

In this role, the Intern will be responsible for assisting the growth and marketing strategies in place and providing support to the CEO & COO. Your duties will include:

•	Helping develop and execute new marketing campaigns with CEO guidance

•	Compiling and maintaining a weekly user growth and marketing report

•	Owning the social media and community channels

•	Assisting the team in organising events and user testing sessions

•	Creating kick-ass online content to engage our community

•	Own our influencer marketing and ambassador program


Who we are looking for:

•	Enthusiastic and socially conscious
•	Creative, with strong written ability
•	Social media savvy
•	Highly motivated, with the ability to deal with the routine tasks as well as the more interesting aspects of the role.
•	Hard working with a positive attitude.
•	Disciplined and organised.
•	Confident and passionate about developing a career in marketing and fintech


Work perks:

•	Working in a beautiful co-working space in Paddington
•	Immense product ownership and room for creativity
•	Free coffee, tea and snacks!
•	Great focus on work-life balance and social team activities. 
•	Opportunity to grow with fast-growing fintech


Preferred skillset:

•	Experience with photoshop
•	Experience with Sketch
•	Social media advertising experience


Lumio is an equal opportunities employer. We embrace diversity and are committed to a working environment where no one will be treated less favourably on grounds of their sex, race, disability, sexual orientation, religion, belief or age.
